New to yoga?

Ease into it and explore your practice with us

Get started!* for new or returning students after 1 year

Divinitree is a lighthearted space to practice yoga, grow, and connect

Whether you’re new to yoga or a seasoned yogi, find your space here to quiet the mind, challenge yourself, embrace community, and of course -- have fun.

We offer classes that fit your schedule

We have an array of classes that will fit your busy schedule and personal needs. Whether you’re seeking to break a sweat, find inner stillness, or just play upside down, we have it all.

Visit our schedule

Our Unlimited Membership provides you the freedom to explore, for as long and as often as you want

No minimum month commitment!

Explore your options

Experience more than “just yoga”

Yoga doesn’t stop when you leave the mat. We feel that finding inner peace, connecting to yourself and others, and having fun can be achieved in numerous ways!

We’ve partnered with Santa Barbara Rock Gym and Paddle Sports Center so you can enjoy discounted rates at their facilities.

Yoga should be accessible to all

We offer several classes per week on a sliding scale from $15 - $22 for those who may not otherwise be able to afford our regular drop-in rates, class packages, or memberships.*

We're happy to support our community by offering discounted classes and kindly ask that those who are in comfortable financial standing help support the health of our studio by contributing what is personally feasible so we can continue to offer community classes. Thank you!

Community classes are available for purchase in-studio.

Discover yourself, Discover Divinitree

SB Local and new to the studio? 30 days of unlimited classes for just $48 is just the opportunity for you!
